name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrono Web Time Tracker - Visualize & Track Your Browsing Habits

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track your online time with Chrono Web Time Tracker. Visualize browsing habits and efficiently monitor web activity and usage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Monitor your web usage effortlessly with Chrono. Completely free and devoid of any ads, Chrono ensures your privacy by not collecting any data. Understand and manage your browsing habits while staying focused and productive.
